Lessons in Love is the third studio album by Lloyd. It is scheduled for release on August 5, 2008. The first single, \"How We Do It (Around My Way)\" features rapper Ludacris, and peaked at number #77 on the Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs chart.
The second single from the album is \"Girls Around the World\" and features rapper Lil Wayne. It was officially made available to US radio stations for airplay consideration on May 12, 2008. So far, it has peaked at #13 on Billboard\'s Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs chart.
Lloyd stated that he would be writing and producing on this album.
The album was originally to be titled Sex Education.
